thread.title: 23 Magical Pictures From The Early Years Of Disney
thread.title_full: 23 Magical Pictures From The Early Years Of Disney

author: Gabriel H. Sanchez
title: 23 Magical Pictures From The Early Years Of Disney
text:
View this image ›
Bettmann / Bettmann Archive Walt Disney working alone at his drawing board on Jan. 1, 1930.
ID: 10490265 View this image ›
Fox Photos / Getty Images A crowd of Londoners gather on a busy street to watch a Mickey Mouse cartoon on Feb. 26, 1931.
ID: 10498473 View this image ›
Ullstein Bild / Getty Images Walt Disney kneels to sketch a pair of fawn, 1938.
ID: 10499130 View this image ›
Hulton Archive / Getty Images Walt Disney tries to coax a penguin into performing for the camera, for a Silly Symphony short film called “Peculiar Penguins,” 1934.
ID: 10490466 View this image ›
Ullstein Bild / Getty Images A group of musicians record the soundtrack for a Mickey Mouse cartoon in July, 1932.
ID: 10498709 View this image ›
Hulton Archive / Getty Images Walt Disney stands next to his wife, Lillian, as she holds one of Disney’s Oscars at an Academy Awards reception in 1935.
ID: 10499191 View this image ›
Bettmann / Bettmann Archive Walt Disney looks over sheet music with actor Eddy Nelson, circa 1940.
ID: 10498406 Photoquest / Getty Images
Getty Images
 At Walt Disney Studios in California, an unidentified animator (left) makes faces in a mirror, which he uses as raw material for his character’s expressions, 1946. American singer and actor Cliff Edwards (right), with a bowler on his head and a cigar in his mouth, records the voice for the character of Timothy Mouse in the Walt Disney animated film Dumbo , 1946.
ID: 10498946 View this image ›
Bettmann / Bettmann Archive Walt Disney smokes a cigarette in 1939 as he checks over the musical scores that will eventually be used in Fantasia .
ID: 10498722 View this image ›
Hart Preston / Getty Images View of the crowd assembled under a theater marquee waiting to attend a screening of Fantasia in Rio de Janeiro, 1941.
ID: 10490540 View this image ›
Hart Preston / Getty Images Walt Disney lies in the sand on Copacabana Beach as he holds an 8mm movie camera while on a trip to scout for locations in Rio de Janeiro, 1941.
ID: 10490519 View this image ›
Hart Preston / Getty Images Disney artist and animator Mary Blair and her husband, fellow artist Lee Blair, sit outdoors and draw sketches of flora in South America while on a trip to scout for locations in Brazil, 1941.
ID: 10498490 View this image ›
Gene Lester / Getty Images Walt Disney talks with a pair of animators about their work, circa 1950.
ID: 10498740 View this image ›
Gene Lester / Getty Images Animators from Walt Disney Studios in Anaheim, California, watch as a man demonstrates a flying motion exercise with a fan, circa 1955.
ID: 10499103 View this image ›
Gene Lester / Getty Images Walt Disney (far right) listens to an unidentified animator talk through the storyboards for the film Sleeping Beauty , circa 1955. Beside them, animator Les Clark plays a record.
ID: 10498726 View this image ›
Gene Lester / Getty Images A man looks through a lens at an oversized paintbrush as a studio artist drips paint from a tube, circa 1955.
ID: 10498755 View this image ›
Alfred Eisenstaedt / Getty Images Walt Disney poses before a scene with his signature creation, Mickey Mouse, circa 1955.
ID: 10498421 View this image ›
J. R. Eyerman / Getty Images A group of Disney musicians record sound effects with a bazooka, disembodied piano, and an assortment of strings, pipes, hinges, and chains in September 1953.
ID: 10498438 View this image ›
Michael Ochs Archives / Getty Images Walt Disney holds up his Oscars for The Vanishing Prairie during the Academy Awards in Los Angeles on Mar. 30, 1955.
ID: 10498801 View this image ›
Earl Theisen Collection / Getty Images Walt Disney stands by a plan and model of the proposed Disneyland and chats with some imagineers in Los Angeles, circa 1954.
ID: 10498952 View this image ›
Bettmann / Bettmann Archive Having put his paw print on the dotted line, Bobby, a Skye terrier from the north of Scotland, is signed to a Hollywood contract by Walt Disney in 1960, one in a long line of animal actors Disney groomed for stardom.
ID: 10499119 View this image ›
Gene Lester / Getty Images Walt Disney sits on a grassy lawn with his grandson in front of the Magic Kingdom’s castle at Disneyland in Anaheim, California, 1955.
ID: 10499306 23. See more incredible pictures from the early days of Disney at Getty Images . ID: 10499964
